title: SparkyType
content:
SparkyType is the type design outlet of [David Buck](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235842/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Buck) of New Zealand.

SparkyType creates quality typefaces that are often inspired by hand-made and quirky alphabets and also offers technical and experimental faces. With experience in custom font creation and customisation, SparkyType is a full-service foundry and is also responisble for the digitisation of the library of [Joseph Churchward](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235842/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joseph%20Churchward).

[http://www.sparkytype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235842/http:/www.sparkytype.com/ "http://www.sparkytype.com/")
author: James Grieshaber
